db:abstract.db:para: The QDnsMailExchangeRecord class stores information about a DNS MX record.

db:listitem.db:para: QDnsMailExchangeRecord is part of Network Programming APIshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: When performing a lookup on a service, zero or more records will be returned. Each record is represented by a QDnsMailExchangeRecord instance.
The meaning of the fields is defined in RFC 1035.

db:section.db:title: QDnsMailExchangeRecord::QDnsMailExchangeRecord()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty mail exchange record object.

db:section.db:title: QString QDnsMailExchangeRecord::exchange() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the domain name of the mail exchange for this record.

db:section.db:title: QString QDnsMailExchangeRecord::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name for this record.

db:section.db:title: quint16 QDnsMailExchangeRecord::preference() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the preference for this record.

db:section.db:title: void QDnsMailExchangeRecord::swap(QDnsMailExchangeRecord &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this mail exchange record with other. This function is very fast and never fails.

db:section.db:title: quint32 QDnsMailExchangeRecord::timeToLive() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the duration in seconds for which this record is valid.

db:section.db:title: QDnsMailExchangeRecord &QDnsMailExchangeRecord::operator=(const QDnsMailExchangeRecord &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the data of the other object to this record object, and returns a reference to it.
